Journal.Title: The Journal of neuropsychiatry and clinical neurosciences

Article.ArticleTitle: Neuropsychiatry's Role in the Postacute Sequelae of COVID-19: Report From the American Neuropsychiatric Association Committee on Research.

Abstract.AbstractText: Postacute sequelae of COVID-19 can occur in patients who had only mild acute disease. A comprehensive neuropsychiatric approach reviews historical factors, provides objective assessment of symptoms, considers potential etiologies, and offers a therapeutic approach aimed at restoring premorbid functioning.
